item.title: RevitBIMTool Update v1.0.1
item.description:
What's New in v1.0.1

  • Added WPF user interface for enhanced user experience
  • Integrated AutoUpdater.NET for automatic updates
  • Enhanced export settings dialog with tabbed interface
  • Improved error handling and logging
  • Better support for multiple Revit versions

Features:

  • Enhanced Export Dialog with PDF, DWG, and NWC settings
  • Automatic update checking on startup
  • Improved user interface using WPF
  • Better integration with Revit ribbon

Bug Fixes:

  • Fixed build issues with cross-platform compilation
  • Improved error handling in export processes
  • Better logging for troubleshooting
